item.title: My public void writeplayers wont show on screen
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

you have to get rid of the
/*, and */

and search for public boolean process and after teh first { put this

writePlayers();

so that it looks like

public boolean process { writePlayers(); //is being called every 500 ms

and it should show up.

Read full topic

item.title: My public void writeplayers wont show on screen
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

does any1 know how to fix?

heres what it looks like::

/////////WRITE THE ALL PLAYERS///////// /*public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@cya@ TankScape!!", 6570); sendFrame126("@red@ Construction Lvl: " +consLevel, 6571); sendFrame126("@gre@ "+players+" Online.", 6572); sendFrame126("", 6664); if (isInBarrows()) { sendFrame126("@yel@Kill Count: " + killcount, 6569); } else { sendFrame126("", 6569); } setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }*/
